main_definition: Selected or picked out from a group of options.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referred to someone who has been selected for a particular role, task, or position.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was chosen as the team captain.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Inherited from parents as an attribute or characteristic.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her intelligence seems to be something she was chosen with by her parents.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something that is particularly suited for a purpose, goal, or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: The right strategy was chosen to overcome the obstacle.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who has been selected as an adviser or counselor.
meanings_and_examples.example: The chosen one will provide guidance and advice throughout your journey.
